init.Title: dbs.init
init.Desc: Loads multiple groups of table layouts from a file or a string.  The file is usually named with .dbs extension. For good execution performance, this function should be executed before main().
init.SummaryLine: Returns a instance containing groups of table layouts
Examples:
local DbsSchema = dbs.init{filename='table.dbs'}
function main(Data)
	local TableSet = DbsSchema:tables('ADT')
end

filename.Desc: Name of the dbs file containing schema definition <u>string</u>.

Returns.Desc: Instance containing groups of table layouts

SeeAlso.Title: The db_connection module - new database methods
